metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17017 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Due to a missing case handling object types, a type confusion vulnerability could occur, resulting in a crash. We presume that with enough effort that it could be exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 68.4 and Firefox < 72.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '72.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:68.4.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
